author: LEGOmyeggo
title: Garbage
review:
We got this set for my sister's birthday and she said, "this is what i've always wanted. WAA!" I picked it up and put it next to the trash can. It blended right in. The garbageman picked it up. "why'd you take it?" my sister asked. He replied "it looked like garbage."
This is a crappy girly set for five, six, and seven year olds. LEGO lost $ making this set.

the soda bottles, swing cat mabye? dock and palm trees

author: wipefeetnmat
title: Cool pieces...
review:
This is set that is really mostly for the pieces which are all really unique. The figures (which are made for girls) cant be incorporated into many other sets so they are a 'dead end' but some of the pieces like the cat, palm tree, swing, and basket are unique and can be only gotten in this set.

    Here are some pros and cons:

Pros: Unique pieces.

Cons: The figures are for girls and you can't use them in other sets.

 

    Overal a decent set I give it a 3/5.
